TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PaperSize extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PaperSize extends System.Object

remarks.format:
## Remarks 和属性使用此类 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 来获取打印机上可用的纸张大小，并分别设置页面的纸张大小。
可以使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> 构造函数指定自定义纸张大小。 只能 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Width%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Height%2A> 为自定义对象设置和属性值 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> 。
有关打印的详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> 命名空间概述。
## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `comboPaperSize` 用打印机支持的纸张大小填充组合框。 此外，还会创建自定义纸张大小，并将其添加到组合框。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.PaperName%2A>标识为属性，该属性将为通过组合框的属性添加的项提供显示字符串 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> 。 该示例假定一个 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 名为的变量 `printDoc` 存在并且存在特定的组合框。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>使用此构造函数创建的始终 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A> 将其属性设置为 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Custom> 。 只能 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Width%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Height%2A> 为自定义对象设置和属性值 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> 。
## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `comboPaperSize` 用打印机支持的纸张大小填充组合框。 此外，还会创建自定义纸张大小，并将其添加到组合框。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.PaperName%2A>标识为属性，该属性将为通过组合框的属性添加的项提供显示字符串 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> 。 该示例假定一个 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 名为的变量 `printDoc` 存在并且存在特定的组合框。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 仅当属性设置为时，才能设置纸张名称 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Custom> 。
## Examples 下面的代码示例将 `comboPaperSize` 用打印机支持的纸张大小填充组合框。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.PaperName%2A>标识为属性，该属性将为通过组合框的属性添加的项提供显示字符串 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> 。 该示例假定一个 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> 名为的变量 `printDoc` 存在并且存在特定的组合框。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示枚举成员的整数值 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> 。 等于48或49或大于118的值表示自定义纸张大小;但是，该 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.RawKind%2A> 属性将返回大小的实际整数值。
|整数|PaperSize 成员| |-------------|----------------------| |1|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Letter>| |2|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.LetterSmall>| |3|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Tabloid>| |4|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Ledger>| |5|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Legal>| |6|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Statement>| |7|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Executive>| |8|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.A3>| |9|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.A4>| |10|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.A4Small>| |11|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.A5>| |12|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.B4>| |13|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.B5>| |14|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Folio>| |15|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Quarto>| |16|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Standard10x14>| |17|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Standard11x17>| |18|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Note>| |19|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Number9Envelope>| |20|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Number10Envelope>| |21|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Number11Envelope>| |22|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Number12Envelope>| |23|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.Number14Envelope>| |24|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.CSheet>| |25|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.DSheet>| |26|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.ESheet>| |27|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.DLEnvelope>| |28|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.C5Envelope>| |29|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.C3Envelope>| |30|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind.C4Envelope>|
